title: Mazinger Z tai Ankoku Daishougun
synopsis: Kouji and his friends have defeated Dr. Hell and are now enjoying a break, but suddenly a strange prophet appears and warns everyone of an oncoming danger, mechanical beasts never seen before start appearing all around the world wrecking havoc. Its up to Kouji and his Mazinger Z to stand up to this threat but it seems he is vastly outnumber and outmatched.
staff: [['Mizuki, Ichirou', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nagai, Go', ['Original Creator']], ['Komatsubara, Kazuo', ['Key Animation']], ['Nishizawa, Nobutaka', ['Series Production Director']]]
